welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Valley Cottage, a charming town known for its beautiful scenery and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. We hope you have a wonderful time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, there is a separate terminal with exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to executive and luxury travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stewart Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Stewart Airport is used for all international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'SWF Free WiFi' on their device.
